original: simpl. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros Hvtmp1 Hvtmp2 Hvsrc Hstack. unfold mm_pop. rewrite <- app_nil_l. apply mm_steps_DEC_0_inv with (x:=src)(k:=tmp1)(v:=v)(st:=(e, v)) in H0. destruct H0 as [k' [Hk' P']]. apply mm_steps_DEC_0 with (k:=k') in H0. apply mm_steps_DEC_0_inv with (x:=tmp1)(k:=tmp2)(v:=v) in H0. destruct H0 as [k'' [Hk'' P'']]. apply mm_steps_DEC_0 with (k:=k'') in H0. apply mm_steps_INC_inv with (x:=src') in H0. exists k''. split. - apply Hk''. - auto.
